title: The Wilderness world of Sigurd F. Olson
creator_credit: Steve A Kahlenbeck, Ray J. Christensen and Filmedia
brief_description: An exploration of the creative response to nature of America’s foremost interpretive naturalist, Sigurd F. Olson. He talks about the challenges and joys of writing, and the wilderness areas of Canada and the northern United States, with film of the dramatic changing seasons of this area.
